summary: AUTO PARKING BRAKE LOCKED UP WHILE DRIVING.  NO REVERSE.  AUTO APPLY BRAKE DID NOT RELEASE.  FOUND LINKAGE SHIFTED.  NOTED TRANSMISSION PROBLEM AT THAT TIME.  CRACKING NOISE FROM DAY OF PURCHASE.  CRACKING NOISE STILL EXIST.  PARKING BRAKE FAILED FOR THE 3RD TIME.  DEALERSHIP REFUSED TO ACKNOWLEDGE PROBLEMS EXIST.  BRAKES LOCKED UP FOR 3RD TIME.   *TT  *JB *TS
